Thanks for finding my video and pressing play! (And SORRY for the sound issues on a few of the GoPro clips - I wasnâ€™t able to fix this with the editing tools I have. Fortunately Iâ€™m starting to edit on Adobe Premiere as of next month! Thank you Patrons for contributing so I can afford the subscription!! ğŸ™ŒğŸ»)

Something a little bit different this week. I ramble on for a bit at the beginning of this video (whoops), but hopefully itâ€™ll give you some context about the video. I think it also shows how difficult it can be to organise making this sort of content.

Humberside is one of the novelty Regional airports scattered around Britain that I havenâ€™t yet â€œticked offâ€ (other airports like this are Durham Tees Valley and Newquay for example!). KLM have had a link to Amsterdam for as long as I can remember and is probably the marquee route for this small, strange former RAF base in the middle of North Lincolnshire. The hotel room I stayed in even looks out onto a Schiphol Road. 

It was great to meet Sunil (unexpectedly!), and while it was disappointing to miss out on the retirement of one of my favourite aircraft, I really love the Embraers. Big windows, decent legroom, and a sleek design make it an aircraft Iâ€™m building a soft spot for. 

If youâ€™re a trip reporter with an established channel on YouTube, let me know if youâ€™d like to collaborate with me in future!

Farewell Fokker 70. ğŸ’™
